attributes.action: Scrap Second Home Allowence For MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Second Home Allowence should be scrapped in receipt of the Government to build a hotel block where every MP will get a room of their own.

This will stop any of these unfair claims as well as each MP will be treated the same.

In the long term this would be the best option.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
